name: Baingan Bharta, Sambhar, Roti And Papad (Roasted Mashed Eggplant, Pigeon Pea Curry, Indian Flat Bread And Lentil Chips)
description: Baingan Bharta, Sambhar, Roti and Papad (roasted mashed eggplant, pigeon pea curry, Indian Flat Bread and lentil chips). Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Toor Daal soaked for an hour ((Pigeon Pea))
1/4 cup green beans or baby eggplant (chopped)
1/2 teaspoon Sambhar powder ((you can buy it at any indian store or make your own recipe))
1 teaspoon lemon juice or 1/4 teaspoon tamarind concentrate.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, heat oil, add the mustard seeds, urad dal,cumin seeds,dry red chillies,curry leaves and asafoetida powder. Mix well and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, heat oil, add the mustard seeds, urad dal,cumin seeds,dry red chillies,curry leaves and asafoetida powder. Mix well and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped onion and garlic and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped onion and garlic and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped tomatoes, carrots, beans or eggplant, sauté for 5-7 minutes until the veggies are half done.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped tomatoes, carrots, beans or eggplant, sauté for 5-7 minutes until the veggies are half done.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the salt, sugar, soaked and drained toor dal, sambhar powder, coriander powder, tamarind concentrate and 1.5 cups water (350ml).
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the salt, sugar, soaked and drained toor dal, sambhar powder, coriander powder, tamarind concentrate and 1.5 cups water (350ml).

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 1 whistle or more(depends on how mashed you want the lentils). If cooking in a pan, cover and cook on low heat for 20 + minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 1 whistle or more(depends on how mashed you want the lentils). If cooking in a pan, cover and cook on low heat for 20 + minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot as side curry, topped with chopped cilantro, with Roti(Indian bread) and a dry veggie dish(subzi)!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot as side curry, topped with chopped cilantro, with Roti(Indian bread) and a dry veggie dish(subzi)!

keywords: Indian curry recipe, quick recipe, vegan main meal
